units.name: cleanbbgames.service
units.contents:
[Unit]
Description=Removes old ball games from /home/{{deploy_user}}/bb_games/

[Service]
Type=oneshot
ExecStart=/usr/bin/sh -c 'find /home/{{deploy_user}}/bb_games/* -mtime +0 -exec rm {} \;'

units.name: cleanbbgames.timer
units.contents:
[Unit]
Description=Run cleanbbgames.service every day

[Timer]
OnCalendar=*-*-* 04:00:00

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
